title: George McLaughlin: The Rutgers Alumnus Who Fought for Civil Rights Through Greensboro Lunch Counter Sit-ins ...
text: ( Source : Rutgers University ) Day after day in 1960 , a group of courageous African-American college students refused to leave the segregated lunch counter of a Woolworth 's in Greensboro, North Carolina . They endured taunts and threats from
